io.sqooba.traildbj

Class TrailDBj.TrailDBConstructor

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sqooba.traildbj.TrailDBj.TrailDBConstructor
  • Enclosing class:
    TrailDBj

    public static class TrailDBj.TrailDBConstructor
extends java.lang.Object
    Class allowing to easily construct a new TrailDB.
    Author:
    Vilya

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TrailDBConstructor(java.lang.String path, java.lang.String[] ofields)
      Construct a new TrailDB.

      Add an event to the TrailDB.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TrailDBConstructor

        public TrailDBConstructor(java.lang.String path,
                          java.lang.String[] ofields)
        Construct a new TrailDB.
        Parameters:
        path - TrailDB output path.
        ofields - Names of fields.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If given path is null.
        TrailDBj.TrailDBError - If allocation fails or can not open constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String uuid,
                long timestamp,
                java.lang.String[] values)
        Add an event to the TrailDB.
        Parameters:
        uuid - UUID of the event to be added.
        timestamp - Event timestamp.
        values - Value of each field.
        Throws:
        TrailDBj.TrailDBError - if number of values does not match number of fields or failed to add to the DB.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If uuid is an invalid 32-byte hex string.

      • append

        public void append(TrailDBj.TrailDB db)
        Merge an existing TrailDB to this constructor. The fields must be equal between the existing and the new TrailDB.
        Parameters:
        db - The db to merge to this one.
        Throws:
        TrailDBj.TrailDBError - if the merge fails.

      • finalise

        public TrailDBj.TrailDB finalise()
        Finalize TrailDB construction. Finalization takes care of compacting the events and creating a valid TrailDB file. Events can not be added after this has been called.
